   20: 
   21: -module(sendfile_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -export([all/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: -export([sendfile_server/2, sendfile_do_recv/2, init/1, handle_event/2]).
   29: 
   30: -export(
   31:     [t_sendfile_small/1,
   32:      t_sendfile_big_all/1,
   33:      t_sendfile_big_size/1,
   34:      t_sendfile_many_small/1,
   35:      t_sendfile_partial/1,
   36:      t_sendfile_offset/1,
   37:      t_sendfile_sendafter/1,
   38:      t_sendfile_recvafter/1,
   39:      t_sendfile_recvafter_remoteclose/1,
   40:      t_sendfile_sendduring/1,
   41:      t_sendfile_recvduring/1,
   42:      t_sendfile_closeduring/1,
   43:      t_sendfile_crashduring/1,
   44:      t_sendfile_arguments/1]).
   45: 
   46: all() ->
   47:     [t_sendfile_small,
   48:      t_sendfile_big_all,
   49:      t_sendfile_big_size,
   50:      t_sendfile_many_small,
   51:      t_sendfile_partial,
   52:      t_sendfile_offset,
   53:      t_sendfile_sendafter,
   54:      t_sendfile_recvafter,
   55:      t_sendfile_recvafter_remoteclose,
   56:      t_sendfile_sendduring,
   57:      t_sendfile_recvduring,
   58:      t_sendfile_closeduring,
   59:      t_sendfile_crashduring,
   60:      t_sendfile_arguments].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
   64: 	{{unix,sunos}, {5,8,_}} ->
   65: 	    {skip, "Solaris 8 not supported for now"};
   66: 	_ ->
   67: 	    Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   68: 	    SFilename = filename:join(Priv, "sendfile_small.html"),
   69: 	    {ok, DS} = file:open(SFilename,[write,raw]),
   70: 	    file:write(DS,"yo baby yo"),
   71: 	    file:sync(DS),
   72: 	    file:close(DS),
   73: 	    BFilename = filename:join(Priv, "sendfile_big.html"),
   74: 	    {ok, DB} = file:open(BFilename,[write,raw]),
   75: 	    [file:write(DB,[<<0:(10*8*1024*1024)>>]) || _I <- lists:seq(1,51)],
   76: 	    file:sync(DB),
   77: 	    file:close(DB),
   78: 	    [{small_file, SFilename},
   79: 	     {file_opts,[raw,binary]},
   80: 	     {big_file, BFilename}|Config]
   81:     end.
   82: 
   83: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   84:     file:delete(proplists:get_value(big_file, Config)).
   85: 
   86: init_per_testcase(TC,Config) when TC == t_sendfile_recvduring;
   87: 				  TC == t_sendfile_sendduring ->
   88:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
   89: 
   90:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
   91: 		   {Size, Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
   92: 		   {ok,Fd} = file:open(Filename, [raw,binary,read]),
   93:                    ct:log("Send(~p): Size = ~p, Fd = ~p~n",
   94:                           [Sock, Size, Fd]),
   95:                    case Sock of
   96:                        {'$inet', Handler, _} ->
   97:                            case
   98:                                Handler:sendfile(Sock, Fd, 0, 0)
   99:                            of
  100:                                {ok, _BytesSent} ->
  101:                                    Data;
  102:                                {error, enotsup} ->
  103:                                    error(notsup)
  104:                            end;
  105:                        _ when is_port(Sock) ->
  106:                            %% Determine whether the driver
  107:                            %% has native support by calling
  108:                            %% the raw module directly; file:sendfile/5
  109:                            %% would just use the fallback
  110:                            %% and we would not be any wiser
  111:                            RawModule = Fd#file_descriptor.module,
  112:                            case
  113:                                RawModule:sendfile(Fd,Sock,0,0,0,[],[],[])
  114:                            of
  115:                                {ok, _Ignored} ->
  116:                                    Data;
  117:                                {error, enotsup} ->
  118:                                    error(notsup)
  119:                            end
  120:                    end
  121: 	   end,
  122: 
  123:     %% Check if sendfile is supported on this platform
  124:     try sendfile_send(Send) of
  125:         ok ->
  126: 	    init_per_testcase(t_sendfile, Config);
  127:         Other ->
  128:             {fail,{not_ok,Other}}
  129:     catch
  130:         error : notsup ->
  131:             {skip,"Not supported"};
  132:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  133:             {fail,{Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  134:     end;
  135: init_per_testcase(_TC,Config) ->
  136:     case read_fd_info() of
  137:         {ok, NumFDs, FDDetails} ->
  138:             [{fds,NumFDs},{details,FDDetails}|Config];
  139:         {error,_Reason} ->
  140:             Config
  141:     end.
  142: 
  143: end_per_testcase(_TC,Config) ->
  144:     case proplists:get_value(fds, Config) of
  145:         undefined ->
  146:             ok;
  147:         NumOldFDs ->
  148:             case read_fd_info() of
  149:                 {ok, NumFDs, FDDetails} when NumFDs =/= NumOldFDs ->
  150:                     ct:log("FDs: ~p~n~ts~nOldFDs: ~p~n~ts~n",
  151:                            [NumFDs, FDDetails,
  152:                             NumOldFDs, proplists:get_value(details,Config)]),
  153:                     {fail,"Too many (or too few) fds open"};
  154:                 _ ->
  155:                     ok
  156:             end
  157:     end.
  158: 
  159: t_sendfile_small(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  160:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  161: 
  162:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  163: 		   {Size, Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  164: 		   %% Here we make sure to test the sendfile/2 api
  165: 		   {ok, Size} = file:sendfile(Filename, Sock),
  166: 		   Data
  167: 	   end,
  168: 
  169:     ok = sendfile_send(Send).
  170: 
  171: t_sendfile_many_small(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  172:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  173:     FileOpts = proplists:get_value(file_opts, Config, []),
  174:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  175: 
  176:     error_logger:add_report_handler(?MODULE,[self()]),
  177: 
  178:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  179: 		   {Size,_} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  180: 		   N = 10000,
  181: 		   {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  182: 		   [begin
  183: 			{ok,Size} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,0,0,SendfileOpts)
  184: 		    end || _I <- lists:seq(1,N)],
  185: 		   file:close(D),
  186: 		   Size*N
  187: 	   end,
  188: 
  189:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0),
  190: 
  191:     receive
  192: 	{stolen,Reason} ->
  193: 	    exit(Reason)
  194:     after 200 ->
  195: 	    ok
  196:     end.
  197: 
  198: 
  199: t_sendfile_big_all(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  200:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  201:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  202: 
  203:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  204: 		   {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} =
  205: 		       file:read_file_info(Filename),
  206: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  207: 		   Size
  208: 	   end,
  209: 
  210:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0).
  211: 
  212: t_sendfile_big_size(Config) ->
  213:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  214:     FileOpts = proplists:get_value(file_opts, Config, []),
  215:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  216: 
  217:     SendAll = fun(Sock) ->
  218: 		      {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} =
  219: 			  file:read_file_info(Filename),
  220: 		      {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  221: 		      {ok,Size} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,0,Size,SendfileOpts),
  222:                       ok = file:close(D),
  223: 		      Size
  224: 	      end,
  225: 
  226:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, SendAll, 0).
  227: 
  228: t_sendfile_partial(Config) ->
  229:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  230:     FileOpts = proplists:get_value(file_opts, Config, []),
  231:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  232: 
  233:     SendSingle = fun(Sock) ->
  234: 			 {_Size, <<Data:5/binary,_/binary>>} =
  235: 			     sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  236: 			 {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  237: 			 {ok,5} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,0,5,SendfileOpts),
  238: 			 file:close(D),
  239: 			 Data
  240: 		 end,
  241:     ok = sendfile_send(SendSingle),
  242: 
  243:     {_Size, <<FData:5/binary,SData:3/binary,_/binary>>} =
  244: 	sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  245:     {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  246:     {ok, <<FData/binary>>} = file:read(D,5),
  247:     FSend = fun(Sock) ->
  248: 		    {ok,5} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,0,5,SendfileOpts),
  249: 		    FData
  250: 	    end,
  251: 
  252:     ok = sendfile_send(FSend),
  253: 
  254:     SSend = fun(Sock) ->
  255: 		    {ok,3} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,5,3,SendfileOpts),
  256: 		    SData
  257: 	    end,
  258: 
  259:     ok = sendfile_send(SSend),
  260: 
  261:     {ok, <<SData/binary>>} = file:read(D,3),
  262: 
  263:     file:close(D).
  264: 
  265: t_sendfile_offset(Config) ->
  266:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  267:     FileOpts = proplists:get_value(file_opts, Config, []),
  268:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  269: 
  270:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  271: 		   {_Size, <<_:5/binary,Data:3/binary,_/binary>> = AllData} =
  272: 		       sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  273: 		   {ok,D} = file:open(Filename,[read|FileOpts]),
  274: 		   {ok,3} = file:sendfile(D,Sock,5,3,SendfileOpts),
  275: 		   {ok, AllData} = file:read(D,100),
  276: 		   file:close(D),
  277: 		   Data
  278: 	   end,
  279:     ok = sendfile_send(Send).
  280: 
  281: 
  282: t_sendfile_sendafter(Config) ->
  283:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  284:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  285: 
  286:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  287: 		   {Size, Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  288: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  289: 		   ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<2>>),
  290: 		   <<Data/binary,2>>
  291: 	   end,
  292: 
  293:     ok = sendfile_send(Send).
  294: 
  295: t_sendfile_recvafter(Config) ->
  296:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  297:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  298: 
  299:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  300: 		   {Size, Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  301: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  302: 		   ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<1>>),
  303: 		   {ok,<<1>>} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 1),
  304: 		   <<Data/binary,1>>
  305: 	   end,
  306: 
  307:     ok = sendfile_send(Send).
  308: 
  309: %% This tests specifically for a bug fixed in 17.0
  310: t_sendfile_recvafter_remoteclose(Config) ->
  311:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  312: 
  313:     Send = fun(Sock, SFServer) ->
  314: 		   {Size, _Data} = sendfile_file_info(Filename),
  315: 		   {ok, Size} = file:sendfile(Filename, Sock),
  316: 
  317: 		   %% Make sure the remote end has been closed
  318: 		   SFServer ! stop,
  319: 		   timer:sleep(100),
  320: 
  321: 		   %% In the bug this returned {error,ebadf}
  322: 		   {error,closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 1),
  323: 		   -1
  324: 	   end,
  325: 
  326:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1},Send,0).
  327: 
  328: t_sendfile_sendduring(Config) ->
  329:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  330:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  331: 
  332:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  333: 		   {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} =
  334: 		       file:read_file_info(Filename),
  335: 		   spawn_link(fun() ->
  336:                                       erlang:yield(),
  337: 				      ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<2>>)
  338: 			      end),
  339: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  340: 		   Size+1
  341: 	   end,
  342: 
  343:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0).
  344: 
  345: t_sendfile_recvduring(Config) ->
  346:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  347:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  348: 
  349:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  350: 		   {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} =
  351: 		       file:read_file_info(Filename),
  352: 		   spawn_link(fun() ->
  353:                                       %% We sleep to allow file:sendfile to be
  354:                                       %% called before this send.
  355:                                       timer:sleep(10),
  356: 				      ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<1>>),
  357: 				      {ok,<<1>>} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 1)
  358: 			      end),
  359: 		   {ok, Size} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  360: 		   timer:sleep(1000),
  361: 		   Size+1
  362: 	   end,
  363: 
  364:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0).
  365: 
  366: t_sendfile_closeduring(Config) ->
  367:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  368:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  369: 
  370:     Send = fun(Sock,SFServPid) ->
  371: 		   spawn_link(fun() ->
  372:                                       timer:sleep(1),
  373: 				      SFServPid ! stop
  374: 			      end),
  375: 		   case erlang:system_info(thread_pool_size) of
  376: 		       0 ->
  377: 			   {error, closed} = sendfile(Filename, Sock,
  378: 						      SendfileOpts);
  379: 		       _Else ->
  380: 			   %% This can return how much has been sent or
  381: 			   %% {error,closed} depending on OS.
  382: 			   %% How much is sent impossible to know as
  383: 			   %%  the socket was closed mid sendfile
  384: 			   case sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts) of
  385: 			       {error, closed} ->
  386: 				   ok;
  387:                                {error, {closed, Size}}
  388:                                  when is_integer(Size) ->
  389:                                    ok;
  390:                                {error, {epipe, Size}}
  391:                                  when is_integer(Size) ->
  392:                                    ok;
  393: 			       {ok, Size}  when is_integer(Size) ->
  394: 				   ok
  395: 			   end
  396: 		   end,
  397: 		   -1
  398: 	   end,
  399: 
  400:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0, [{active,false}]),
  401:     [] = flush(),
  402:     ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0, [{active,true}]),
  403:     [] = flush(),
  404:     ok.
  405: 
  406: flush() ->
  407:     lists:reverse(flush([])).
  408: 
  409: flush(Acc) ->
  410:     receive M ->
  411:             flush([M | Acc])
  412:     after 0 ->
  413:             Acc
  414:     end.
  415: 
  416: t_sendfile_crashduring(Config) ->
  417:     Filename = proplists:get_value(big_file, Config),
  418:     SendfileOpts = proplists:get_value(sendfile_opts, Config, []),
  419: 
  420:     error_logger:add_report_handler(?MODULE,[self()]),
  421: 
  422:     Send = fun(Sock) ->
  423: 		   spawn_link(fun() ->
  424:                                       timer:sleep(1),
  425: 				      exit(die)
  426: 			      end),
  427: 		   {error, closed} = sendfile(Filename, Sock, SendfileOpts),
  428: 		   -1
  429: 	   end,
  430:     process_flag(trap_exit,true),
  431:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  432: 		       ok = sendfile_send({127,0,0,1}, Send, 0)
  433: 	       end),
  434:     receive
  435: 	{stolen,Reason} ->
  436: 	    process_flag(trap_exit,false),
  437: 	    ct:fail(Reason)
  438: 	after 200 ->
  439: 		receive
  440: 		    {'EXIT',_,Reason} ->
  441: 			process_flag(trap_exit,false),
  442: 			die = Reason
  443: 		end
  444: 	end.
  445: 
  446: t_sendfile_arguments(Config) ->
  447:     Filename = proplists:get_value(small_file, Config),
  448: 
  449:     {ok, Listener} = gen_tcp:listen(0,
  450:         [{packet, 0}, {active, false}, {reuseaddr, true}]),
  451:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listener),
  452: 
  453:     ErrorCheck =
  454:         fun(Reasons, Offset, Length, Opts) ->
  455:             {ok, Sender} = gen_tcp:connect({127, 0, 0, 1}, Port,
  456:                 [{packet, 0}, {active, false}]),
  457:             {ok, Receiver} = gen_tcp:accept(Listener),
  458:             {ok, Fd} = file:open(Filename, [read, raw]),
  459:             {error, Reason} = file:sendfile(Fd, Sender, Offset, Length, Opts),
  460:             true = lists:member(Reason, Reasons),
  461:             gen_tcp:close(Receiver),
  462:             gen_tcp:close(Sender),
  463:             file:close(Fd)
  464:         end,
  465: 
  466:     ErrorCheck([einval,badarg], -1, 0, []),
  467:     ErrorCheck([einval,badarg], 0, -1, []),
  468:     ErrorCheck([badarg], gurka, 0, []),
  469:     ErrorCheck([badarg], 0, gurka, []),
  470:     ErrorCheck([badarg], 0, 0, gurka),
  471:     ErrorCheck([badarg], 0, 0, [{chunk_size, gurka}]),
  472: 
  473:     gen_tcp:close(Listener),
  474: 
  475:     ok.
  476: 
  477: %% Generic sendfile server code
  478: sendfile_send(Send) ->
  479:     sendfile_send({127,0,0,1},Send).
  480: sendfile_send(Host, Send) ->
  481:     sendfile_send(Host, Send, []).
  482: sendfile_send(Host, Send, Orig) ->
  483:     sendfile_send(Host, Send, Orig, [{active,false}]).
  484: 
  485: sendfile_send(Host, Send, Orig, SockOpts) ->
  486: 
  487:     SFServer = spawn_link(?MODULE, sendfile_server, [self(), Orig]),
  488:     receive
  489: 	{server, Port} ->
  490:             Opts = [binary,{packet,0}|SockOpts],
  491:             io:format("connect with opts = ~p\n", [Opts]),
  492: 	    {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, Opts),
  493: 	    Data = if is_function(Send, 1) ->
  494: 			   Send(Sock);
  495: 		      is_function(Send, 2) ->
  496: 			   Send(Sock, SFServer)
  497: 		   end,
  498: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
  499: 	    receive
  500: 		{ok, Bin} ->
  501: 		    Data = Bin,
  502: 		    ok
  503: 	    end
  504:     end.
  505: 
  506: sendfile_server(ClientPid, Orig) ->
  507:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, {packet, 0},
  508: 				     {active, true},
  509: 				     {reuseaddr, true}]),
  510:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(LSock),
  511:     ClientPid ! {server, Port},
  512:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
  513:     {ok, Bin} = sendfile_do_recv(Sock, Orig),
  514:     ClientPid ! {ok, Bin},
  515:     gen_tcp:send(Sock, <<1>>).
  516: 
  517: -define(SENDFILE_TIMEOUT, 10000).
  518: sendfile_do_recv(Sock, Bs) ->
  519:     TimeoutMul = case os:type() of
  520: 		     {win32, _} -> 6;
  521: 		     _ -> 1
  522: 		 end,
  523:     receive
  524: 	stop when Bs /= 0,is_integer(Bs) ->
  525: 	    gen_tcp:close(Sock),
  526: 	    {ok, -1};
  527: 	{tcp, Sock, B} ->
  528: 	    case binary:match(B,<<1>>) of
  529: 		nomatch when is_list(Bs) ->
  530: 		    sendfile_do_recv(Sock, [B|Bs]);
  531: 		nomatch when is_integer(Bs) ->
  532: 		    sendfile_do_recv(Sock, byte_size(B) + Bs);
  533: 		_ when is_list(Bs) ->
  534: 		    ct:log("Stopped due to a 1"),
  535: 		    {ok, iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse([B|Bs]))};
  536: 		_ when is_integer(Bs) ->
  537: 		    ct:log("Stopped due to a 1"),
  538: 		    {ok, byte_size(B) + Bs}
  539: 	    end;
  540: 	{tcp_closed, Sock} when is_list(Bs) ->
  541: 	    ct:log("Stopped due to close"),
  542: 	    {ok, iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse(Bs))};
  543: 	{tcp_closed, Sock} when is_integer(Bs) ->
  544: 	    ct:log("Stopped due to close"),
  545: 	    {ok, Bs}
  546:     after ?SENDFILE_TIMEOUT * TimeoutMul ->
  547: 	    ct:log("Sendfile timeout"),
  548: 	    timeout
  549:     end.
  550: 
  551: sendfile_file_info(File) ->
  552:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size}} = file:read_file_info(File),
  553:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(File),
  554:     {Size, Data}.
  555: 
  556: sendfile(Filename,Sock,Opts) ->
  557:     case file:open(Filename, [read, raw, binary]) of
  558: 	{error, Reason} ->
  559: 	    {error, Reason};
  560: 	{ok, Fd} ->
  561:             try file:sendfile(Fd, Sock, 0, 0, Opts)
  562:             after
  563:                 _ = file:close(Fd)
  564:             end
  565:     end.
  566: 
  567: %% This function returns the number of open fds on a system
  568: %% and also a string representing more detailed information
  569: %% for debugging.
  570: %% It only supports linux for now.
  571: read_fd_info() ->
  572:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  573:     ProcFd = "/proc/" ++ os:getpid() ++ "/fd",
  574:     case file:list_dir(ProcFd) of
  575:         {ok, FDs} ->
  576:             {ok, length(FDs),
  577:              lists:flatten(lists:join(" ", FDs)) ++
  578:                  ("\r\n"++os:cmd("ls -l " ++ ProcFd))};
  579:         Error ->
  580:             Error
  581:     end.
  582: 
  583: %% Error handler 
  584: 
  585: init([Proc]) -> {ok,Proc}.
  586: 
  587: handle_event({error,noproc,{emulator,Format,Args}}, Proc) -> 
  588:     Proc ! {stolen,lists:flatten(io_lib:format(Format,Args))},
  589:     {ok,Proc};
  590: handle_event(_, Proc) -> 
  591:     {ok,Proc}.
